column2: SELECT AlbumID, SUM(UnitPrice) AS totalPrice, COUNT(AlbumID)         AS numTracks     FROM chinook.Track     GROUP BY AlbumID ) SELECT TOP # album.Title, artist.ArtistID, album.numTracks, album.totalP FROM album JOIN chinook.Artist artist ON artist.ArtistId=album.ArtistID SELECT AlbumID, SUM(UnitPrice), COUNT(AlbumID)         AS totalP     FROM chinook.Track     GROUP BY AlbumID
